verses.verse: וַיְבִיאֵ֖נִי <WH935> vay-vi-'E-ni Afterward he brought אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַהֵיכָ֑ל <WH1964> ha-hei-Chal; me to the temple וַיָּ֣מָד <WH4058> vai-Ya-mod and measured אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֵילִ֗ים <WH352> ha-'ei-Lim, the posts שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> shesh- six אַמּ֨וֹת <WH520> am-Mot cubits רֹ֧חַב־ <WH7341> Ro-chav- broad מִפּ֛וֹ <WH6311> mip-Po on the one side וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> ve-shesh- and six אַמּֽוֹת־ <WH520> 'am-mot- cubits רֹ֥חַב <WH7341> Ro-chav broad מִפּ֖וֹ <WH6311> mip-Po on the other side רֹ֥חַב <WH7341> Ro-chav [which was] the breadth הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> ha-'O-hel. of the tabernacle
